_comments.note: This is a template file for creating new projects. Copy this file and modify the content.
_comments.note_zh: 这是创建新项目的模板文件。复制此文件并修改内容。
_comments.important: The 'id' field must exactly match the filename (without .json extension)
_comments.important_zh: 'id' 字段必须与文件名（不含 .json 扩展名）完全一致

title: Project Title Here
short_description: Brief description of the project for the project card display.
_pdf_note: Optional: Leave as empty string "" if no PDF link. Button will not display if empty. / 可选：如果没有 PDF 链接，留空字符串 ""。如果为空，按钮不会显示。
_code_note: Optional: Leave as empty string "" if no code link. Button will not display if empty. / 可选：如果没有代码链接，留空字符串 ""。如果为空，按钮不会显示。
_slides_note: Optional: Leave as empty string "" if no slides link. Button will not display if empty. / 可选：如果没有幻灯片链接，留空字符串 ""。如果为空，按钮不会显示。
_project_page_note: Optional: Leave as empty string "" if no project page link. Button will not display if empty. / 可选：如果没有项目页面链接，留空字符串 ""。如果为空，按钮不会显示。

sections.title: Section Title 1
sections.text: Section content text goes here. You can write multiple paragraphs or detailed information about this section.

sections.title: Section Title 2
sections.text: Another section with its own content. Add as many sections as needed.

figures.caption: Figure caption text describing what the figure shows

tables.caption: Table caption describing the table content

_bibtex_note: Optional: Leave as empty string "" if no BibTeX citation. BibTeX section will not display if empty. / 可选：如果没有 BibTeX 引用，留空字符串 ""。如果为空，BibTeX 部分不会显示。
